title: Newly-Opened Palampur Retreat with 180° Himalaya Views and Daily Three-Course Dinner
description: Discover peace and solitude in the breathtaking hills of Himachal at the newly-opened Araiya Palampur, standing at an incredible altitude of 5,000 feet and surrounded by spectacular peaks, plunging rivers and panoramic 180° views over the Himalayas. Enter a nature lover's haven close to Dharamshala's flourishing tea estates, Tibetan monasteries and outdoor trekking adventures staying in a Deluxe Room with daily buffet breakfast, daily three-course dinner and a one-time 45-minute massage per person, per stay, for two adults.
offer_address: Morepaani Kandi village, Tehsil, Palampur, Himachal Pradesh 176061, India

title: Serene Himalayan Tea Plantation Escape with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Nestled in the stunning Kangra Valley, surrounded by the snow-capped peaks of the Himalayas in Himachal Pradesh, The Lodge at Wah is the ideal mountain escape for the weary urban soul. Proudly eco-friendly, the lodge is set in a gorgeous tea estate in Palampur and promises a rejuvenating break from city life. 

Enjoy all-inclusive dining with daily breakfast, lunch and dinner, a tea tour and tasting once during your stay, a sunset picnic in the tea garden once during the stay and complimentary Wi-Fi.
offer_address: Panchrukhi - Paprola Road Patti, Deogran, Himachal Pradesh 176061
